title: Aw tunah hian chanchin mak tak chu
lyrics:
Aw, tunah hian chanchin mak tak chu,
A lo thleng hril sen rual a ni lo;
Lalpa Isua hmangaih aw mawi chu,
Khawvelah a thang mek a ni.

Zion-a mi an duh loh kha,
Thiltihtheihna lalthutthlengah chuan;
Ropui leh thianghlim zahawmin,
Hnam tinrengin an hmu ang.

Kalvari-a thihna hnehtu kha,
Hrilh fiah thei tu mah reng an awm lo;
Aw mawi chhiar sen loh lawmna ber leh,
Nun sang tam tak siamtu a ni.

A fimna leh a vawhna hmaah,
Ding thei thianghlim tu mah an awm lo;
Ropuina leh rorelna zawng zawng,
Amen, Lal Isua ta a ni.

A chuai lo vang ka Chhandamtu chu,
Minung, Pathian Fapa, Lalber chu;
A mawi ber e, Nunna par chu,
Fak r'u, lei leh van mite u.

"Ngai teh, ka lo kal thuai dawn," a ti,
Tho rawh u, Lalpa tan pen rawh u;
A rorelna ni chu a hnai ta,
Aw ka nunna, Lalpa fak rawh.
